item.description:
http://www.petwellnes...
Raising Awareness about Pet Wellness and Education

Day: Saturday, October 17, 2009
Time: 10:00AM - 4:00PM
Place: Dog Talk & TheraPet, LLC
24 Tenney Road
Pelham, NH 03076
Donation: $ 10.00 per person and one pet ($5.00 for each additional pet)

Registration & Raffle proceeds will benefit the Registered Pet Partner and Reading Education Assistance Dog Teams of New England Pet Partners who visit rehabs, hospitals, nursing and assisted-living facilities, schools and libraries.

You and your pet will experience the benefits of, and learn about, whole health nutrition and well-being. Contributors will be on hand with services, products and raffles!
TTouch
Massage & Acupressure
Reiki (energy balancing)
Healthy Grooming
Whole Health Nutrition
Intuitive Healing & Consulting
Behavioral & Wellness Help
Delta Society® Teams
Reading Education Assistance Dogs R.E.A.D.®
Photos with your Pet– and more


Join us for a day of caring, networking and making a difference for pets.

Registration http://www.petwellnes...

If you have ever wondered how dogs, cats and miniature horses get to visit nursing homes, rehabs, hospitals, schools and libraries, then this is the event to attend for information.

*Note: All pets must be current on Rabies, on leash or carried. Pets being treated for any skin disorders or illnesses must have prior “written” approval from their Primary Veterinarian to attend. Pets in heat may not attend. Children under 16 must be supervised by an adult. Thank you.

More? info@petwellnessfestival.org

group.name: Human Soles & Doggie Paws Hikers & Walkers of Manchester, NH

item.name: 6th Annual Pet Wellness Festival
